REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2842 reute r f BC-BROWN-DISC-TO-BUY-RHO 10-19 0076

TEXT.TITLE: BROWN DISC TO BUY RHONE-POULENC <RHON.PA> UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Brown Disc Products Co Inc, a unit fo Genevar Enterprises Inc, said it has purchased the ongoing business, trademarks and certain assets of Rhone-Poulenc's Brown Disc Manufacturing unit, for undisclosed terms. Rhone-Poulenc is a French-based chemical company. Under the agreement, Rhone-Poulenc will supply magnetic tape and media products to Brown Disc Products. Reuter
